entry.title: if couches could talk
entry.summary:
Author: seaweedwater

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 118,222Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 167

Summary: Derek watched Stiles grow into the young man he is now—smart, funny, kind, exceptional, truly gorgeous. He could easily find someone his age who would give him the time of day, but he doesn’t seem interested in a relationship, or anything that could distract him from pining for Derek’s notice. Derek would be lying if he said he didn’t like the attention. He’s careful with it, careful not to indulge him and lead him on, to take advantage, because there’s nothing that could ever happen between them. He’s a child, his son’s best friend, the son of a Sheriff who has a gun rack, and Derek is thirty-six and unhappily married with taxes to pay and a house to maintain. It’s just a fantasy, something Derek lets his mind play with since he knows nothing could ever come of it. If he imagines Stiles’ fingers inside him instead of his own, it’s not like anyone else could ever know that.

entry.title: Ten years (4 months and 15 days)
entry.summary:
Author: MariaGbriela

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,529Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 17

Summary: The user requires a literary translation of a creative writing piece from Portuguese to English. Everything was still in place, and yet, it wasn't. He loathed these ten-year reunion things, he was no good at them. Then, he heard a laugh, and he knew exactly who it was. He froze, because ten years was a long time, and yet, it wasn't. Scott hadn't changed a bit, but it didn't matter. Stiles was with the Hale pack, and they were after their land again. Or, Stiles left a little after defeating Theo, it was on everyone's mind. After ten years, Stiles is back in Beacon Hills, and coming after what belongs to his pack.

entry.title: Packed Subways
entry.summary:
Author: paintedrecs

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,123Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 91

Summary: The hardest part of living in the city, Derek thinks, is trading in his car for public transit. He understands the convenience and necessity, but for someone with supernatural senses, the twice-daily ride feels a little too close to torture. But you do anything for pack, right? Laura had told him he didn't have to come with her and insisted he actually consider his options. What options? he'd thought bleakly. Of course he'd go with her—his Alpha, and his only remaining family. Even if the city's constant noise and smells grate on him. After a particularly unpleasant incident on the subway, Derek switches his routine—and, it turns out, his entire view on city life. The front subway car isn't really any less packed than the one he'd used before, and his constant low simmer of irritation with crowds doesn't dissipate. He sticks with the new habit, though, because the one thing the front car does have is Stiles.

entry.title: From Surrogate to Mate: Trust, Loyalty, and Love
entry.summary:
Author: Foxywho93

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,957Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 53

Summary: What started out as a surrogacy contract, turned into something more. A story about trust, loyalty, family, pack… and danger. Stiles Stilinski didn’t expect his life to collapse all at once — losing school, his apartment, even the Jeep that reminded him of his parents. Homeless, broke, and desperate, he walked into Woodland Grove Surrogacy Agency with nothing left to lose. He only wanted a chance to survive. Derek Hale came to the agency looking for someone strong enough to carry his pup. He didn’t expect his instincts to lock on the sarcastic, exhausted human with too-thin wrists and too-bright eyes. But his wolf knew immediately: Stiles was the one. Now Stiles is pulled into the Hale estate — into a world of warmth, loyalty, and pack — a world that insists he belongs even as he struggles to believe it. But whispers turn into threats, and danger follows close behind. Because sometimes fate doesn’t just hand you family. Sometimes it throws you into it claws-first.

entry.title: All Hale Caffeine - Book 1
entry.summary:
Author: Molly_Is_A_Fangirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,782Chapters: 4/15Kudos: 54

Summary: Prompt: Coffee shop Au where the owner is increasingly concerned about the amount of caffeine this customer is ingesting.Derek returned to Beacon Hills with his sister once she’d finished college. He’d attended business school for a few years and decided that he’d open his own coffee shop: All Hale Caffeine - Laura picked it. They had gotten the shop up and running while visiting his uncle who was slowly starting to get better and working on rebuilding the old house. After all, it was time to start living again.Stiles Stilinski was 17, a spark, and just trying to finish high school. That proves impossible when his best friend gets bitten by a rogue alpha. Queue the Hales entering their lives as Stiles and Scott deal with the mess they’ve found themselves in. At least Stiles is getting good coffee out of this ordeal - if only the Sourwolf owner would stop commenting on his health.A Season 1 AU Rewrite - where the Hales return two-ish years before season 1’s events. Peter doesn’t go insane, Scott still gets bitten, and Stiles already knows about the supernatural world. Oh, and Derek had actual therapy while in New York.

entry.title: Blood and Ashes
entry.summary:
Author: lavieboheme0919

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 72,385Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 44

Summary: Several centuries after the Last Battle, the White Tower stands taller than ever—rebuilt, restructured, and reeling from new threats that no one dares name aloud. Saidin has returned, cleansed and chaotic, and the Hall of the Tower seeks control more than balance. When Stiles—a powerful male channeler raised to Aes Sedai—survives a narrow vote in the Hall for flouting Tower law and custom, he’s spared gentling… but not punishment.Bound without consent to Sitters from opposing Ajahs, declared the first Striker since the Age of Legends, Stiles finds himself weaponized by a Tower that fears what it cannot command. But Stiles is not their dog to tame, and the Tower is not as united as it pretends to be. As ancient tensions simmer and forgotten enemies stir, bonds—both sacred and profane—will be tested.This is not the story of the Dragon. This is what comes after.Power without trust. Bonds without love. And one man who will burn down the Pattern before letting them leash him again.Note: There will be some AI-generated art for an important moment from each chapter at the end of each chapter.

entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 71,405Chapters: 44/75Kudos: 41

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.
